Pre-Game Insights: Bahrain lost their final encounter of 2023, 2-0, versus the UAE, while Australia ended the year with three successive triumphs, defeating Palestine in November 1-0.
Bahrain's manager, Juan Antonio Pizzi, has only one defeat since taking charge, while Australia's Graham Arnold's men have been in strong form recently.
Bahrain and Australia are preparing for the Asian Cup, with both teams aiming to make it to the knockout stage.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bahrain have never beaten Australia in their five previous meetings, with Australia winning all.
Australia boasts an all-time 100% record versus Bahrain, conceding only once in their five previous encounters.
Others: The match is a friendly ahead of the Asian Cup, with both teams eyeing a spot in the knockout stage.
Key players to watch include Harry Souttar for Australia and Mohamed Marhoon for Bahrain.
